text: Kee nummayse maraaw! Maggom uma-dareemuk exxeera, diggah dareemuk garab dambik. Kaadu sittin qaybi mafokkaaqinaay, mariiy-mara (gari-garu) siinik camtewaay, isi toobokoytay rabê cado yakmem siinik kicna num maay yan? Toh niqibtoonuhuk, cami inqibaay Yallak meesita, diggah Yalli isi naqoosak toobat oggolé, xuwaw-li
